title: ninna nODi
sahitya:
ninna nODi dhanyanAdenO hE shrInivAsa


anupallavi

  ninna nODi dhanyanAde enna manadi nindu suprasanna daya mADi nInu munninante salaha bEkO


caraNam 1    pakSivAhana lakSmIramaNa lakSmi ninna vakSatalli rakSana shikSana takSa pANDava pakSa kamalAkSa rakSisu
    caraNam 2    dEsha dEsha tirugi nAnu AshAbaddhanAde svAmi dAsanenisi enna jagadIsha kAyo vAsudEva
    caraNam 3    kandu janaka koTTU enage antarangada sEveyannu antaravillade pAlisayya hontakAri purandara viTTala
